Если описывать данное произведение кратко, то могу сказать, что игра очень даже хороша.Определённо советую всем приобрести и пройти данную игру.
Если подлиннее, то что касается геймплея он интересен и затягивает на несколько часов. Головоломки достаточно занимательные. Сюжета, (как по моему мнению и в остальных играх от Valve) здесь не так много, но он выполняет свою функцию и толкает действие вперёд. Графика глаз не режет, но и ни чем не впечатляет, (да, в принципе она здесь не нужна). Музыку, (как впрочем и в других ШЕДЕВРАХ от Вентеля), оценить не смог. 
В итоге Portal вполне окупается, доставляет немало удовольствия, немного учит геометрии и физики, ну и, конечно, финальная песня миленькая.
gg
A masterpiece without question; great humor, challenging puzzles (for a first time player of the series), and the challenge mode keeps the game fun even after the story.

Fact: Best game ever!

This was the first game I ever purchased and played through Steam, and I quite enjoyed it. It is a fairly simple game, but runs well, and I enjoyed the little details, such as the "Dollars and [I]SENSE[/I]" slideshow and references to other games (looking at you, Half Life!) hidden throughout, as well as the different objects that had a few life-like qualities (mugs would shatter if you dropped them). The puzzles [I]are[/I] simple, but they require coordination and timing and really force you to get creative. However, I was a little disappointed by the shortness and lonely feel of the game.

Overall, I would give this a 4.5/5 rating.
Simple, innovative, brilliant. Not as fleshed out as it's sequel, but it is still a brilliant game and a must-play for anybody.

So I finally played  portal a few months ago and it was amazing. I only wish I had played this game sooner. First off the concept of the portal gun and portals is awesome, it opens up so many new possibilities and really makes this game stand out. This is paired with the excellent  level design and an intriguing story making this game great. My only real problem with this game is how short it is, in the 12 hours I've played I beat the game a couple of times, and apart from that its an all around great experience.

I bought the game today, and finished it today. What can I say, the best puzzle game I've ever played, and probably the best singleplayer game. Incredible humor, puzzles that seem easy at first, but really require you to think before acting. This Oldie keeps making players enjoy and have fun for good 10 hours of their life for over 12 years, and is probably as old as most of those who just discovered it haha. I know it really was fun for me, and I'm looking forward to 100% fully complete it. This is probably the first and last time I'm going to use this word unironically, but this game truly is epic.

Puzzles simples, todo lo que necesitas lo tienes desde el principio. Por otra parte GLaDOS obtiene poco a poco una personalidad, hasta llegar a ser bastante carismatica, algo que no esperarias de una IA.
有些机关比较巧妙，可惜玩着会头晕，尤其是穿过地板上的portal的时候。不知道是游戏的某些参数没调好，还是这种情况就是违背人的生理反应。

Mal wieder ein Valve-Klassiker. Für Puzzle-Fans wie mich ist Portal ein absolutes Muss! Mit der einfachen Mechanik, zwei Portale zu platzieren und dann durchgehen zu können kann man so viel anfangen! Trotz dieser einfachen Mechanik fühlt sich jeder Raum ganz neu an, stellt eine neue Herausforderung dar und fühlt sich nicht repetitiv an. Die Story ist natürlich einfach nur geil. Man wacht in einer Kapsel in einem Testraum auf und weiß gar nicht was hier los ist. Außerdem läuft das Spiel auf jedem Computer und sieht trozdem nicht schlecht aus. Die Fortsetzung, Portal 2, ist ebenfalls ein absolutes Muss!
